agenda_items.title: Confirmation of the Minutes of 47th Meeting of Board of Governors
agenda_items.details: Minutes of the 47th Meeting held on June 26, 2019, confirmed with incorporation of comments from JS & FA MHRD and Under Secretary (NIT) MHRD regarding Item No. 47.28 and reference to MHRD letter F. 35-5/2018-TS III dated 4th April 2019 for Item No. 47.15.

agenda_items.title: Actions Taken on Decisions of 46th BOG Meeting
agenda_items.details: Actions taken on the decisions of the 46th BoG meeting were noted.

agenda_items.title: Implementation of Strengthening of Administration
agenda_items.details: Periodic review of Central Government Employees under FR 56(j)/(l) and Rule 48 of CCS (Pension) Rules, 1972 adopted and confirmed.

agenda_items.title: Fixation of License Fee of Different Buildings
agenda_items.details: Board approved and confirmed recommendations of the committee for use of office buildings, academic buildings, and market complex by contractors/agencies/shopkeepers.

agenda_items.title: Recruitment of Assistant Registrar and Assistant Librarian
agenda_items.details: Board approved appointments of three Assistant Registrars. Recommendation for Assistant Librarian deferred due to concerns regarding new recruitment rules.

agenda_items.title: International Conference on Applied Mathematics and Computational Intelligence (ICAMCI-2020)
agenda_items.details: Approved without any financial expenditure from sanctioned Ministerial fund.

agenda_items.title: Assets & Liabilities Dues to Govt. of Tripura
agenda_items.details: Board approved payment of Rs. 56,49,968/- to DHE, Government of Tripura and suggested communication with MHRD for position clearance.

agenda_items.title: Recommendation of 33rd Finance Committee Meeting
agenda_items.details: Board approved the minutes of the 33rd Finance Committee Meeting held on June 26, 2019.

agenda_items.title: Absorption of Dr. Govind Bhargava, Registrar
agenda_items.details: Proposal declined as absorption violated NIT statutes/Recruitment rules. Instructions given regarding superannuation, pension, and remuneration adjustments.

agenda_items.title: International Workshop on Advanced Seismology, Seismic Hazard and Earthquake
agenda_items.details: Approved without financial expenditure from sanctioned Ministerial fund.

agenda_items.title: Absorption of Mr. Sunil Das, Estate Engineer
agenda_items.details: Direct absorption from State Services declined due to absence of provision in Recruitment rules/NIT Statutes.

agenda_items.title: Issues Pertaining to TEQIP-III Program
agenda_items.details:
A. Second (3rd) Phase Procurement Plan approved under TEQIP rules; redundant pages to be corrected by Director.
B. Minor Research Grants up to 3 Lakh to Assistant Professors approved under TEQIP rules; expenditures under CPDA not allowed under this grant.

agenda_items.title: Any Other Issue with Permission of Chair
agenda_items.details: Proposal to recruit one Technical Personnel (on contract) for MIS, NITA to be put up in forthcoming BoG meeting.

conclusion: Meeting ended with a vote of thanks to the Chair.
